article-meta.issue-title: Special Issue on Writing and Cognition (continued)

body.p: In addition to the fine and tireless work of Written Communication’s Editorial Board, the editor acknowledges and thanks the following colleagues for reviewing manuscripts for Written Communication recently.
Denis Alamargot, Université de Poitiers (France)
Rui Alves, University of Porto (Portugal)
Natasha Artemeva, Carleton University (Canada)
